item.title: Checking out Advent of Cyber 2023
item.description: To keep this spoiler-free, I’ll be redacting the flag. Whenever you see {{ .flag }} in the text, it means that I’ve redacted the flag. Yes, this is go’s text/template syntax. It’s the best templating language on the planet. Getting started The signup/login UX leaves something to be desired. You start off on the advent page, then sign up, and after the initial signup you are not redirected to the advent.
